SERVERSTATUS_MOJANG_DESC: If active, the status of Mojang's servers will be displayed
SERVERSTATUS_TITLE_DESC: Your description of the server (If empty, the server's MOTD will be displayed)
SERVERSTATUS_SHOW_IP_DESC: If active, the ip address of the server will be displayed in the status of this one
SERVERSTATUS_SHOW_CONNECTED_DESC: If active, the number of connected players will be displayed in the status of this one
SERVERSTATUS_SHOW_STATUS_CONNECTION_DESC: If active, the connection status will be displayed in the status of this one
